Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Hammer, Nebukar

    public abstract class Sprite
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Sprite class for movers
    Version:
    Prototype
    Author:
    Nathaniel and Ben Smith
